commit.message:
re PR fortran/10843 (g77 -ffree-form rejects "GO TO".)

2003-05-31  Bud Davis  <bdavis9659@comcast.net>

	PR fortran/10843
	* sta.c (ffesta_second_): Parse GO TO correctly,
	even in free source format.

From-SVN: r67276
